title: 96/324/EC: Commission Decision of 20 December 1995 refusing the United Kingdom's application for protective measures with regard to pharmaceutical products coming from Spain (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 20 December 1995 refusing the United Kingdom's application for protective measures with regard to pharmaceutical products coming from Spain (Only the English text is authentic) (96/324/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The application for safeguard measures made by the United Kingdom under Article 379 of the Act of Accession, aimed at solving the problem caused by the expiry of the transitional period provided for by Article 47 of the Act of Accession, concerning pharmaceutical products coming from Spain, which are protected by a product patent in the United Kingdom but not in Spain, is rejected.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1995.
For the Commission
Mario MONTI
Member of the Commission
